                     java.lang.String password)
        Funtion that verifies that user input data matches the data stores in the database, validating or not the login
        Parameters:
        username - String that represents the username of the client
        password - String that represents the password of the client
        Returns:
        boolean true if login is successful or false if login is unsuccessful
